roleset.name: engaged, occupied
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2, 3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Within CXN
example.text: I just talked to her and she 's home and physically fine and dealing with the immediate aftermath so was too busy to talk .

example.name: All args
example.text: By day he is busy with religion's work, by night intoxicated with certainty's tidings.

roleset.name: artistic -- pattern characterized by too much going on!
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2, 3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Decorating tips
example.text: Choose a small print or solid color fabric if the wallpaper is really busy.
